verbose_text: When we modulated the spiking activity of the CDI by de- and hyperpolarizing current injection of 2 nA (XREF_FIG), neither increasing nor abolishing the CDI spike activity affected the amplitude or timing of the corollary discharge inhibition in the dendrite of the MGI (XREF_FIG, B-D).
evidence: modulated the spiking activity of the CDI by de- and hyperpolarizing current injection of 2 nA
